statements.query: MATCH ((n) <-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})) where EXISTS(n.exposed_internet) AND labels(n) IN [['AzureNetwork']] WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE n.exposed_internet return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
